meanings.definition: Showing disapproval of those considered to be of lower social class.
meanings.sent1: She acted snobbier than usual when she saw the old car.
meanings.sent2: The snobbier guests refused to sit with the rest of the group.
meanings.sent3: He felt snobbier than a cat wearing a crown.
meanings.sent4: Her snobbier attitude was like a dark cloud over the party.
meanings.sent5: The snobbier behavior made everyone uncomfortable.

meanings.definition: Behaving in a way that shows one thinks they are superior to others.
meanings.sent1: The snobbier students only talked to each other during lunch.
meanings.sent2: She became even snobbier after winning the award.
meanings.sent3: His snobbier attitude was like a peacock showing off its feathers.
meanings.sent4: The snobbier tone in her voice made it clear she thought she was better.
meanings.sent5: Their snobbier behavior made them unpopular with the rest of the class.

meanings.sent1: The new member was even snobbier than the old one.
meanings.sent2: She became snobbier as she climbed the social ladder.
meanings.sent3: His snobbier outfit made him look like a fancy penguin.
meanings.sent4: The snobbier attitude was like a wall between them.
meanings.sent5: The snobbier appearance made everyone stare.
